title: The Rapha Blaero Project takes aero clothing at Unbound to a whole new level
content:
The Rapha Blaero is a custom skinsuit for offroad racing with a hydration bladder in back and gel pockets on the sleeves.

Read the full article at The Rapha Blaero Project takes aero clothing at Unbound to a whole new level on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
